p: Among all subjects in Stratum 1 who received DFMO, the two-year EFS was 84% ± 4% and OS was 97% ± 2% (Fig. 2a,b). The median follow-up time is 3.5 years (range 2.1–5.8 years). EFS and OS were similarly high regardless of high risk features, including MYCN status (Table 1, Fig. 2c,d). The subset of subjects that received DFMO following completion of the COG ch14:18 antibody clinical trial (ANBL0032, n = 81) had a 2-year EFS of 86% ± 4%, (Fig. 2e) and OS of 97% ± 2% (Fig. 2f).
